page.title: 13CLIMATE AND WEATHER
page.content: A mild area with prevailing southwest wind. Temperatures influenced by wind off the Severn, usually slightly lower in the Summer and warmer in Winter than the surrounding areas. Sea mists drift in over the lowland and are slow to clear. FOOTPATHS Many of the footpaths, approximately 7 kilometres in length, connect the out-lying farms to Hallen Village. A further 3\ kilometres link Severn Road to Minors Lane Bridle Path. Most of the footpaths are overgrown through lack of use but all are protected rights of way and recorded on Avon County Council Definitive Map in the Planning Department.
